summary: Talkative, hyperactive young drifter Ville Alfa goes around Helsinki, basically trying to borrow money from friends and strangers by means of an incessant delivery of quirky and snappy quasi-intellectual lines and fabricated excuses.
cast: Aki Kaurismäki|Pirkko Hämäläinen|Juuso Hirvikangas|Lars Lindberg|Esa Sirkkunen|Jukka Järvelä|Marja Heiskanen|Matti Pellonpää|Mikko Mattila|Taina Nyström|Eija Vilpas|Toni Sulzbeck|Juhani Tommola|Reino Markkanen|Paula Kaurismäki|Markku Peltola|Tapio Saariaho|Virve Larimo|Jukka Anttila|Tinnu Suninen|Mikko Kivinen|Kalevi Kannisto|Anne-Mari Salo|Markku Oikkonen|Juice Leskinen
title: Valehtelija
